entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Redundant bounds check for arr[X >> CNS] pattern #109899
    10.0.0

Closed

  • MacBook DotNet Debug Mode Performance Issues #109898
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in NtProcessInfoHelper.GetProcessInfos when retrieving Process.SessionId #108798
  • Blazor app is broken by AOT in .NET9.0 update #109894
  • System.Management 9.0.0 throws an exception #109860
  • Facilitating convention based configuration loading #48294
    Future
  • Add new rule for detecting implementations of GetHashCode that uses mutable data #48769
    Future
  • One time mass coreclr asan failure in HTTP stress tests #109824

PullRequests

Created

  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • JIT: (x u>> cns) -> [0..(x's max value >> cns)] #109900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unsafe perf quirks from System.Text.Encodings.Web #109896
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 131.0.6778.69, windows: 131.0.6778.70 #109895
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • tailcalls-with-helpers.md typo (heper) #109897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
  • fix(wasm): proper library detection for browserwasm and wasi #109866
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove more HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection #109882
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure that MultiplyAddEstimate exits for cases where GT_MUL is unsupported #109842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Numerical ordering for string compare/equals/hashcode #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #108661
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix failing test on NativeAOT #109853
    area-Tracing-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add sample & package testing #2783

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch file-watching has regressed in 9.0 #44912
  • dotnet: /lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.34' not found (required by dotnet) (Installing on Raspberry pi 3) #44911

PullRequests

Updated

  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #7651
    13.0

Updated

  • The design space for extensions #8548

PullRequests

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: add rules for type inference and overload resolution #8598

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False positive `IDE0241 Nullable directive is unnecessary` #75951
  • Action `Convert to tuple` on anonymous object does not remove trailing comma #75950
    Backlog
  • MemberNotNullWhen is ignored with static methods #75949

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35516.11 #75945

PullRequests

Created

  • Include list of processes that lock file in `can't write file` error message #75946
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, VSCode, New Feature - Null Conditional Assignment, 17.13 P2
  • Reuse segments during SegmentedDictionary growth #75943
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #59012
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, single_query #59011
  • `BindProperty` correctly correctly does not include GET, but incorrectly includes DELETE #59010
  • Perf regression: fortunes, updates #59009
  • Perf improvement: updates #59008
  • In .net 9 blazor wasm mode, unhandled exceptions in asynchronous methods will cause the Runtime to crash #59007

Closed

  • RendererInfo causes "SyntaxError: Unexpected end of JSON input" #58977
  • Perf improvement: mvc #59005
  • .net 9 blazor Uncaught (in promise) Error: Assert failed: .NET runtime already exited with 1 Error: Assert failed: #59006

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ViewHandler<TVirtualView, TPlatformView>.PlatformView` getter throws `InvalidOperationException` #25908
  • MAUI Hybrid Blazor: Significant Build Time Increase in .NET 9 Debug Mode Compared to .NET 8 #25907
  • MAUI vs-code can't recognized JDK #25906

Closed

  • iOS 18.0+ Maui bug with MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync #25879
  • Upgrading to .NET 9 cause build time too long #25900
  • Access the pixels in GraphicsView? #25905

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Gradient never returns to the correct color - fix #25910
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-border

Updated

  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing - fix #24766
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area-controls-window
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
